attributes.additional_details: Regardless of the current situation or situations like these we are the ones to keep things going. We are the ones to always make an effort to help people, to safe lifes, to help the community and to keep fighting, whatever comes our way. We are the ones to keep on going when everything else has stopped. We are the ones who get the least respect. Any other time we are being treated with disrespect, even though we are trying to safe people's life and do so with every inch of power that we have.
attributes.background: NHS workers are the essential workers to support this country. We should be exempt from paying TAX on the low salary we receive anyway. This is to show them how much we are respected in the community and to pay tribute for how much do. Even taxi drivers earn 2-3 times as much as we do.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/304595

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
